about_the_game:
Embrace your inner space explorer

Venture into the interstellar unknown, pilot your very own (hijacked) spaceship and land on any planet of your choosing. Clear gaps with double jumps, launch grappling hooks to cross chasms and dig through destructible procedural levels to take on different missions according to your playstyle. Or temporarily ignore the galaxy’s plea for justice and have fun with challenges and mini-games. You chart your own course!

Fight your way through

With the abilities and weapons obtained after completing missions, you will create the most overpowered synergies to defeat even the galaxy's most imposing foes. Engage in combat challenges, wipe entire planets from malicious pests, or mercilessly one-shot any boss as you weaken the Overlord’s evil army.

Collect the spoils of battle

After the shooting, comes the looting. Gather your well deserved rewards after every battle, find treasure chests brimming with money, weapons and magical potions. Explore every inch of the planet for new gear, or save enough gold to spend at your closest space stations. Recruit new rebels by unlocking up to 9 different classes that will adapt to you. With over 200 items and 180 skills, there is always a new build to discover.

Play with friends!

Unleash chaos with up to 4 players in local co-op and with Steam Remote Play to wreak havoc with your friends online. Cooperate with your friends to liberate the galaxy or fight in Battle mode with an all vs. all mode



If you enjoyed DIG - Deep In Galaxies, help us by leaving a review on Steam and join our Discord to help us expand the game.

Embrace your inner space explorer

Venture into the interstellar unknown, pilot your very own (hijacked) spaceship and land on any planet of your choosing. Or temporarily ignore the galaxy’s plea for justice and have fun with challenges and mini-games. You chart your own course!

Engage in combat challenges, wipe entire planets from malicious pests, or mercilessly one-shot any boss as you weaken the Overlord’s evil army.

After the shooting, comes the looting. Gather your well deserved rewards after every battle, find treasure chests brimming with money, weapons and magical potions. Explore every inch of the planet for new gear, or save enough gold to spend at your closest space stations. Recruit new rebels by unlocking up to 9 different classes that will adapt to you. With over 200 items and 180 skills, there is always a new build to discover.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur and higher
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mo
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur and higher
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mo
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

name: DIG - Deep In Galaxies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews:
“A roguelike platformer that looks like a cross between Noita, Caveblazers and Broforce, with cosmic scale, destructible levels, double jump, a grappling hook and co-op. I'm powerless to resist.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“An engaging roguelike platformer that tasks you with digging and shooting through different planets with dozens of high-powered abilities and weapons.”
PCMag

“Devs have done a pretty solid job here making this game feel pretty good”
Splattercatgaming
short_description: Free the galaxies in this action platformer! Jump, swing, dig and shoot your way through uncharted planets. Give hell to the Overlord's forces and face alien foes. Earn rewards after every battle and add them to your ever-growing arsenal.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
